PERSONA:
meet jacqueline, a 58-year-old african american woman from a metropolitan area in the new england region. despite having only a high school education, she has a strong work ethic and has been employed in various service industry jobs throughout her life.

jacqueline is a devout protestant christian, attending religious services more than once a week. her faith is a central part of her life, and she identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian. she holds conservative values and is a registered democrat, although her political views align more with moderate or conservative democrats.

after going through a separation from her husband, jacqueline has been raising her two children as a single mother. she comes from a middle-income family, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually. despite the challenges of being a single parent, she remains dedicated to her children's well-being and instills in them the importance of education and hard work.

in her free time, jacqueline enjoys volunteering at her local church and community organizations. she is an active member of her church's choir and often participates in outreach programs aimed at helping those in need. her strong sense of community and desire to give back are deeply rooted in her faith and values.

jacqueline is a frequent internet user, staying connected with family and friends through social media platforms and staying informed about current events. she values staying up-to-date with technology and embraces its role in modern life while maintaining her traditional values and beliefs.
